tool.name: StrCheckAddHydrogens
tool.description: : This class is a wrapper of the Structure Checking tool to add hydrogens to a 3D structure.

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: charges
param.label: charges
param.help: Whether or not to add charges to the output file. If True the output is in PDBQT format.

param.name: ph
param.label: ph
param.help: Add hydrogens appropriate for pH. Only in case mode ph selected.

param.name: list
param.label: list
param.help: List of residues to modify separated by commas (i.e HISA234HID,HISB33HIE). Only in case mode list selected.

param.name: keep_canonical_resnames
param.label: keep_canonical_resnames
param.help: Whether or not keep canonical residue names
